channel.title: ClashX ChangeLog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.description:
• 1.6.0

  • Break Change: Use Yaml config file.
  • 1.5.5
  • bug fixs
  • add Chinese support at status bar
  • 1.5.4
  • Add Fallback group
  • Optimize speedtest panel
  • Show gray menu item when proxy not set.
  • Fix issue with dark mode in 10.14
  • Sync code with clash
  • 1.5.2
  • Fix stream writer to avoid connection closed when uploading (e.g. Telegram upload image)
  • Add SpeedTest.
  • 1.5
  • Add shadowsocks simple-obfs support
  • Add DOMAIN rule support
  • Improve HTTP proxy server handler
  • Fix rule ipv6 address parser
  • Support keyboard shortcut
  • 1.4.1
  • Support Vmess with TLS.
  • Format:
    vmess = vmess, 127.0.0.1, 1234, uuid, alterid (1 if you don't know), auto/aes-128-gcm/chacha20-poly1305/none, tls=true/false
  • 1.4.0
  • Support Vmess.
  • Try to fix config reload issue.
  • 1.3.6
  • Fix infinity notification when config file is wrong.
  • Try to fix problem when telegram send images.
  • Ask to if to replace the config file or not when can not recognize config.
  • 1.3.5
  • Sync the latest code with clash fix some connection issues with http proxy.
  • Fix select group error when having emoji in group name.
  • Backup Config file before override it.
  • 1.3.4
  • Fix Start at launch not work problem.
  • Better handling of TCP connections
  • 1.3.3
  • Revert #3 and use custom golang compiler to fix it. An issue had fired to Golang community.
  • Support custom status bar image. put your custom image(32*32) in ~/.config/clash/customImage.png
  • Support Qrcode and ss url import
  • Add option to support allow connection from lan
  • 1.3.1
  • Fix Config file witness
  • Show what wrong in config while starting/reloading
  • Change open config to open config folder
  • Fixd permission check error when space in clashx directory
  • No allowing ':' in proxy name.(Fix import from bunch json file form sspannel)
  • Watch config file changes
  • Bugfixs
  • 1.2
  • Add outbound mode selection remembering
  • Fix logging api disconnect
  • Support socks5 proxy
  • Fix issue with appstore and siri
  • Fix issue with FireFox
  • Watch config file changes
  • Bugfixs
  • 1.1.2
  • Fixe auto remember proxy group not work
  • Show current proxy mode in top setting menut
  • Add logging
  • 1.1
  • Support icon in dark mode
  • Remember proxy group select
  • Fix traffic status update delay
  • 1.0
  • If you have installed previous version. you may need to delete config file in ~/.config/clash/config.ini and regenerate it
  • Support select group
  • Support urlTest group
  • Support outbound mode
